thread.title: Police carry out controlled explosion on suspect package near Downing Street
thread.title_full: Police carry out controlled explosion on suspect package near Downing Street

author: tmeyjes
title: Police carry out controlled explosion on suspect package near Downing Street
text:
Anti-terror police have carried out a controlled explosion (Picture: AP Photo/Matt Dunham) Police have carried out a controlled explosion on a package found at Horse Guards Parade near to the site of the London terror attack.
More to follow.
MORE: London terror attacker ‘was English teacher obsessed with body building’ 
MORE: Fundraiser set up to help families of the victims of the London terror attack
